item.title: Project I: Linear regression from scratch
item.description: Built linear regression model from scratch without using the popular python library, sklearn. This gives more insight into how the model works. Started with simple linear model with one independent variable or feature. Then extended to multiple features, here an error function is constructed which is optimized using the gradient descent method Lastly, a polynomial regression model is built. Link to Github repository
